page.title: 02Life in a Preparatory School
page.content: At 7.30 we are woken by a teacher and we go downstairs to wash and then have breakfast.After breakfast we go into chapel for some prayers,make our beds and then go into classes.We have three lessons until break when we go outside for half an hour.We then have another three lessons which are followed by lunch.After lunch there is playtime until 2.00 p.m.when we have another two lessons,except for Wednesdays and Saturdays when we all play games,either rugby in the winter or cricket in the summer.Tea is at 4.15 and that is followed by an hour's studies.At 6.00 p.m.the day boys can go home or stay to join in some of the activities,like photography,computing, chess or just play with their friends.Supper is at 7.00 and all the boys are in bed by 9.30 p.m.
